entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Black Diamond 06:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
